bean.description: 根据购物车行查询包装信息.

constructor-arg.value:
select shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.id as shoppingCartLinePackageInfoId, shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.PACKAGEINFO_ID as packageInfoId, shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.SHOPPING_CARTLINE_ID as shoppingCartLineId,
packageInfo.type as type, packageInfo.total as total, packageInfo.FEATURE_INFO as featureInfo, packageInfo.EXTEND_INFO as extendInfo
from T_SC_SHOPPING_CARTLINE_PACKAGE_INFO shoppingCartLinePackageInfo join T_SC_SHOPPINGCARTLINE shoppingCartLine on shoppingCartLine.id = shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.SHOPPING_CARTLINE_ID join T_PI_PACKAGE_INFO packageInfo on packageInfo.id = shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.PACKAGEINFO_ID
where shoppingCartLinePackageInfo.SHOPPING_CARTLINE_ID in ( #foreach($shoppingCartLineId in $shoppingCartLineIdList ) $shoppingCartLineId, #end -1)

bean.description: 基于shoppingCartLineId 删除 对应的包装信息.
